languages.text: Until the end of the Soldier's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and their attacks do not spend MP.
languages.original_text: До конца своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} солдат получает +4 ОП, а его атаки не расходуют {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Until the end of the Marksman's turn, they gain +4 MP and their attacks do not spend MP.
Until the end of the Marksman's turn, they gain +4 MP and their attacks do not spend MP.
Until the end of the Soldier's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and their attacks do not spend MP.

languages.text: До конца своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} солдат получает +4 ОП, а его атаки не расходуют {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}.
languages.original_text: Until the end of the Soldier's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and their attacks do not spend MP.

traits.locale_text: До конца своего хода стрелок получает +4 ОП, а его атаки не требуют затрат ОП.
До конца своего хода стрелок получает +4 ОП, а его атаки не требуют затрат ОП.

languages.text: 直到士兵{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束前，士兵获得+4{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，且士兵的所有攻击都不再消耗移动点数。
languages.original_text: Until the end of the Soldier's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and their attacks do not spend MP.

traits.locale_text: 直到士兵{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束前，士兵获得+4{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，且士兵的所有攻击都不再消耗移动点数。

languages.text: Hasta el final del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del soldado, gana +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} y sus ataques no gastan PM.
languages.original_text: Until the end of the Soldier's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and their attacks do not spend MP.

traits.locale_text: Hasta el final del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del tirador de élite, este gana +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} y sus ataques no gastan PM.

languages.text: Der Soldat erhält bis zum Ende seines {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}, außerdem kosten seine Angriffe keine BP.
languages.original_text: Until the end of the Soldier's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and their attacks do not spend MP.

traits.locale_text: Der Scharfschütze erlangt bis zum Ende seiner {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}, außerdem kosten seine Angriffe keine BP.

languages.text: Jusqu'à la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, le soldat gagne 4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} et ses attaques ne coûtent aucun PD.
languages.original_text: Until the end of the Soldier's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and their attacks do not spend MP.

traits.locale_text: Jusqu'à la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, le Tireur d'Élite bénéficie de +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} et ses attaques ne coûtent aucun PD.

languages.text: 兵士の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了まで、{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}が+4され、攻撃でMPを消費しなくなる。
languages.original_text: Until the end of the Soldier's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and their attacks do not spend MP.

traits.locale_text: マークスマンの{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了まで、{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}が+4され、攻撃でMPを消費しなくなる。
